RevText.raw: This wine is the best I have tasted from the Bavarian region. With a strong smoke and hicoky, there are hints of pine and oranges that accentuate the full body. A must drink for all seasons with meat dishes. Germany is rightfully proud to produce such an exquisite product.
RevText.processed: wine good taste bavarian region strong smoke hicoky hint pine orange accentuate body drink season meat dish germany rightfully proud produce exquisite product
